ygData.subject: Re: Proving Ground.
ygData.msgSnippet: Firedrill starts to speak up. Iron Raptor, let me prove myself to you. He finishes, wanting a purpose for once in his life.

Firedrill starts to speak up. "Iron Raptor, let me prove myself to you." He
finishes, wanting a purpose for once in his life.
